someone who does a job willingly without being paid
Most of the relief work was done by volunteers.
someone who is willing to offer help
I need some volunteers to help with the washing-up.
someone who joins the army, navy, or air force without being forced to
to offer to do something without expecting any reward, often something that other people do not want to do
I volunteered my services as a driver.
Helen volunteered to have Thanksgiving at her house this year.
to tell someone something without being asked
Michael volunteered the information before I had a chance to ask.
to offer to join the army, navy, or air force
When war broke out, my father volunteered immediately.
to say that someone else will do a job even though they may not want to do it
Mum volunteered Dave for washing-up duties.
